page.description: Specify if the map should show the 'Street View' control. This is the icon of a small figure that you can drag onto the map to show the street view.

section.description: Click down on the street view icon and then, without releasing the mouse button, drag the icon over one of the shaded areas on the map. Then release the mouse button. The street view appears where the icon is dropped

figure.title: Dragging the icon onto a map
